0011110110011011 1011100011101111 0 -> sum: 1111011010001010, cout: 0
1100101101011000 0111001111011101 0 -> sum: 0011111100110101, cout: 1
1010101010100101 1110010001000100 0 -> sum: 1000111011101001, cout: 1
0010111111011011 1110001000001101 0 -> sum: 0001000111101000, cout: 1
0010011100001011 1010110011000100 0 -> sum: 1101001111001111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
